comment: work only due every 2 weeks, discussion+lab+quiz each time. no final, no lockdown browser. this class was the least stressful ive ever had. can be hard still if you struggle w the subject, but way better than any other science class ive had.

Professor Andersen gives clear grading. Weekly Discussion - find news event based on key words assigned. Read Power Points and required chapters before labs and timed quizzes. Quizzes are from PP, Lab and chapter. I took her online summer, a 4 week semester, 4 credits, very feasible. Take her, follow syllabus; she's very nice - but do the work.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria

comment: Took this class online, overall easy. Just read the PowerPoints and you should be good. Quiz, lab, discussion due every 2 weeks so its not too much. No webcam
